content.rendered:
Directed by Rajiv S. Ruia.

Written by A.M. Turaz.

Cast Rajneesh Duggal(Vicky Shukla). Nidhi Subbaiah(Dolly Pandey). Arjun Bijlani(Kabeer Bajpai). Rajesh Shringarpure(Rawde Bhau) . Rajkumar Kanojia((as Rajkumar Kannojia)). Hemant Pandey(Virender Thakur).Padam Singh. Shiva Singh(Pandit ji)

Language Hindi.

Producers Manoj Kumar. Pradeep K Sharma.

Production Baba Motion Pictures pvt ltd.
